page.title: 03CARDROSS _ POPULATION
page.content: {SIZE-}THE POPULATION OF CARDROSS IS AROUND 2,500 BUT, OF THESE, ONLY 400 LIVE IN OUR SECTION OF THE MAP. THE POPULATION GREW RAPIDLY DURING THE LAST 20 YEARS BUT BUILDING HAS NOW ALMOST COME TO A STANDSTILL. {COMPOSITION -}THE OUTLYING FARMS AND HOUSES ACCOUNT FOR ABOUT 70 PEOPLE. COUNCIL HOUSES HOUSE A FURTHER 100 OR SO AND THE REMAINING 250 LIVE IN NEW PRIVATE HOUSES. VERY FEW ARE NATIVE CARDROSSIANS! {AGE-}THIS IS A VILLAGE OF YOUNG FAMILIES AND RETIRED PEOPLE, WITH A DEARTH OF YOUNG PEOPLE BETWEEN THE AGES OF 18_30. {TURNOVER-}THERE IS PERHAPS A 10% ANNUAL TURNOVER IN PRIVATE HOUSING. MOVEMENT IN THE COUNCIL ESTATE IS MUCH SLOWER MAKING IT AN AREA OF CONTINUITY OF VILLAGE LIFE.
